# AdaptiveResolutionComponent

**Structure**

A component that provides the suggested pixels per meter necessary to render an object.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AdaptiveResolutionComponent
```

## Overview

Use the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AdaptiveResolutionComponent/pixelsPerMeter] property to proactively update your scene to disable expensive systems and high-resolution content that is far away.



## Initializers

- **init()**: Creates a new instance of the adaptive resolution component.

## Instance Properties

- **pixelsPerMeter**: A read-only value representing the suggested pixels per meter necessary to render an object.

## Render configuration

- **ModelSortGroupComponent**: A component that configures the rendering order for an entity’s model.
- **ModelSortGroup**: A group that you assign to multiple entities to tell the renderer what order and how to render the entities in the group.
- **OpacityComponent**: A component that controls the opacity of an entity and its descendants.
- **ModelDebugOptionsComponent**: A component that changes how RealityKit renders its entity to help with debugging.
- **MeshInstancesComponent**: A component that performs GPU instancing on the model of the same entity.

## Conforms To

- Component
